ygData.subject: Re: Banded Armor vs Chainmail
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, banded better than chainmail, lighter more ac.  Get the tunic first, legs second, since they are the highest ac.  just bought a full set for 70 on
ygData.messageBody:
yes, banded better than chainmail, lighter more ac. Get the tunic first,
legs second, since they are the highest ac. just bought a full set for 70
on veeshan, but that was in Nektulos, dunno what pricing is like up in the
frozen lands?

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

> From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]

> Subject: [warriors_eq] Banded Armor vs Chainmail

>
> From: suzkim@...

>
> Azlana, warrior of Veeshan
